name: Auto Build Master Whitelist

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: "0 0 * * 0"   # jalan tiap minggu jam 00:00 UTC
  workflow_dispatch:       # bisa dijalankan manual dari GitHub

permissions:
  contents: write          # izin supaya bisa commit & push ke repo

jobs:
  whitelist:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Gabung whitelist internal + komunitas
        run: |
          mkdir -p filters/whitelist-all
          # Gabungkan whitelist internal
          cat \
            filters/whitelist.txt \
            filters/whitelist-spotify.txt \
          > filters/whitelist-all/tmp.txt

          # Tambah whitelist komunitas (contoh sumber)
          curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anudeepND/whitelist/master/domains/whitelist.txt >> filters/whitelist-all/tmp.txt
          curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hagezi/dns-blocklists/main/whitelist.txt >> filters/whitelist-all/tmp.txt

          # Sort dan hapus duplikat
          sort -u filters/whitelist-all/tmp.txt -o filters/whitelist-all/whitelist-all.txt
          rm filters/whitelist-all/tmp.txt

      - name: Commit & Push
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "RifqyBot"
          git config --global user.email "bot@rifqyshield.local"
          git add filters/whitelist-all/whitelist-all.txt
          git commit -m "Auto update master whitelist (whitelist-all/whitelist-all.txt)" || echo "No changes to commit"
          git push
